attributes.action: Increase exports to accelerate economic growth
attributes.additional_details:
All successful economies are very successful exporters.
There is no national focus on exporting.
UK exports to high growth consumer spending economies is minimal.
There needs to be a high profile, national campaign to accelerate exports and increase economic growth.
Exports are 25% of GDP.
An annual increase of 10% in exports would add over 2% to growth in UK GDP.
